column4: I am getting rid of Windows and switching to Ubuntu on my Dell Vostro. It uses Broadcom drivers.
When i boot from liveCD, it prompts me to install additional drivers..but the installed OS doesn not. The PC sees no networks :(
I tried https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/bcm43xx but didn't work. Nothing appears in System->Admin->Hardware
How do I install stuff from the CD? Mount or something?
